overview: Eric is an expert in the area of multimedia communication and video compression. He is the author of the book “Peer-to-Peer Video Streaming” and has contributed to over 30 research papers in his field. He holds 6 patents either granted or pending. Prior to founding Tango, he co-founded and served as the CTO of Dyyno, a video streaming company, and also worked as a research scientist as HP Labs. Eric holds a B.S. degree from Ecole Polytechnique, France and M.S. and Ph.D. degrees, in Electrical Engineering, from Stanford University.
